- [93mHigh[0m-[93mthroughput[0m [93msynthesis[0m of [93mmulti[0m-[93melement[0m [93malloy[0m [93mnanoparticles[0m [93musing[0m [93msolvothermal[0m [93mcontinuous[0m-[93mflow[0m [93mreactor[0m.: [93mHigh[0m-[93mthroughput[0m [93msynthesis[0m of [93mmulti[0m-[93melement[0m [93malloy[0m [93mnanoparticles[0m ([93mMEA[0m [93mNPs[0m) is [93messential[0m for [93maccelerating[0m the [93mdiscovery[0m of [93madvanced[0m [93mmaterials[0m with [93mcomplex[0m [93mcompositions[0m. [93mHerein[0m, [93mwe[0m [93mdeveloped[0m an [93mautomated[0m [93mcontinuous[0m-[93mflow[0m [93mreactor[0m [92msystem[0m [93mcapable[0m of [93msynthesising[0m a [93mwide[0m [93mvariety[0m of [93mMEA[0m [93mNPs[0m under [93mcontrolled[0m [93msolvothermal[0m [93mconditions[0m (up to [93m400[0m °[93mC[0m and [93m35[0m [93mMPa[0m).
